replies.body:
okay, not sure if u guys know but here it is:

there was recently a vote for {{champion:17}} , {{champion:131}}  and {{champion:111}}  for who should get the fire or ice skin.
{{champion:131}}  was the winner, and she will be receiving a skin depending on the winner of this "elemental" clash.
if you don't trust me go on [here](http://www.surrenderat20.net/) this is a legit website that is updated by the players on PBE. They are checked over by main moderator Moobeat.
well TPA ez i think is 750 and shockblade zed is 975 i think, and the bundle is 50% off, so id say about 863 rp for both

Ooooh. Sounds Nice
But I Highly doubt it. Snowstorm Sivir and Snow Bunny Nidalee Bundle was 1196rp. 520+975... I think about 1200 actually.!

But the bundle right now is 1349rp... Im confused :P. Do I buy Zed?


I think yes :P

OMG YOU'RE A NINJA! Just baught Zed and...

862rp..... Man... Have you been talking to Zed?
Why is the SKT T1 Zed skin silver? and not gold like it is normally? It also shows up in the client too (in the bundle)
